body.p: City located in the extreme south of Judah’s territory adjacent to neighboring Edom (Jos 15:21; also called Jekabzeel in Neh 11:25). Benaiah, one of David’s valiant warriors, came from there (2 Sm 23:20; 1 Chr 11:22). The reference in Nehemiah indicates that Judah’s tribe returned to this area after the exile. Its exact site is not known, but Khirbet Hora has been suggested.
